title: PORTO Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Classic Analog watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design. Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)★ 24h Analog Dial★ Watch Battey★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)★ Date, day ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)
★ 24h Analog Dial
★ Watch Battey
★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)
★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)
★ Date, day
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Just installed. Seems to be working fine. Pretty good looking. One question though: isn't it possible to show the next watch alarm on the watch face ? It's funny but I haven't found any face having such a feature... Am I the only one to want this piece of information displayed permanently ?
Smart looking smartwatch! A really classy face, with crisp fonts and high visibility. Easy on the battery. Bravo!
Sony Xperia Z Hello is very very good thanks
